title: Async API

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

This extension will define a set of java interfaces that allows accessing information hold by an AsyncAPI file  (An interface equivalent in functionality to [OpenAPI](https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-core/blob/master/modules/swagger-models/src/main/java/io/swagger/v3/oas/models/OpenAPI.java)) 

As part of its deployment part, this extension will parse a set AsyncAPI file and generates:

- A quarkus config source containing smallrye channel configuration
- A Java implementation of the AsyncAPI mentioned before

The idea is that async API files does not need to be parsed again during runtime by the application code. 


### Repository name

quarkus-asyncapi-metaconfig

### Short description

Async api quarkus configuration and metadata generator 

### Repository Homepage URL

https://www.asyncapi.com/

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- 
...

### GitHub Applications?

- [ ] [Stale](https://github.com/marketplace/stale) - Automatically close stale Issues and Pull Requests that tend to accumulate during a project

### Additional context

We are going to use this generator for Kogito, but we feel is generic enough to be delivered as extension
